caption.title: Fitting results of the dynamic model.
caption.p: (A) Time series of Norway rat population density and (B) HFRS cases. Black points indicate the real observations (obs) and lines indicate the simulated (sim) time series. Shaded areas indicate the 95% credible interval. (C) The season pattern of Norway rat population density and (D) HFRS cases. The 5% and 95% of simulated data are shown in shaded area.
